_documentation.instructions: This file contains events for all Sunstone groups. The first event for each group will be displayed on the home page.
_documentation.how_to_add: To add a new event: 1) Copy an existing event object, 2) Update all fields, 3) Place it at the beginning of the group's events array if it's the next upcoming event
_documentation.how_to_edit: To edit an event: Find the event by title and date, then update the necessary fields
_documentation.how_to_delete: To delete an event: Remove the entire event object (including the surrounding { } and the comma if needed)
_documentation.time_format: Use 12-hour format with AM/PM (e.g., '5:00 PM - 7:00 PM')

events.title: Movie Night
events.description: Join us every 4th Tuesday of the month for a cozy night in with popcorn, good vibes, and a community-picked movie! Vote for your favorite film in the Discord channel—whichever gets the most love is what we’ll watch. We’ll provide the movie and the snacks—just bring yourself and get comfy!
